      Source code for pycheron.util.logger

      import logging

__all__ = ["Logger"]


      [docs]class Logger():
    """
    Creates a logging object to be fed into metrics or callPycheronMetric to log errors, metric calculation duration,
    and warnings.
    """
    def __init__(self, filename):
        """
        :param filename: Name and location of log file to be created or used (i.e. pycheron.log)
        """
        logging.basicConfig(filename=filename, level=logging.INFO, format='%(asctime)s %(message)s',
                            datefmt='%m/%d/%Y %I:%M:%S %p')
        self._name = filename


      [docs]    def log(self, message):
        """
        :param message: Log message
        :type message: str
        """
        if self._name is not None:
            logging.info("INFO: " + message)
      


      [docs]    def warn(self, message):
        """
        :param message: Warn message
        :type message: str
        """
        if self._name is not None:
            logging.warn("WARNING: " + message)
      


      [docs]    def error(self, message):
        """
        :param message: Error message
        :type message: str
        """
        if self._name is not None:
            logging.warn("ERROR " + message)
